channel.title: Comments on: Too Cute to Be a Guard Dog
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Thu-Minh, We're so happy to hear your family is enjoying the mini stuffed Kuri and prototype book! Our team loved creating those gifts, and we're glad to hear your family is enjoying getting to know your robot. Thanks for sharing, and happy holidays! :)
item.content:encoded: Hi Thu-Minh, We’re so happy to hear your family is enjoying the mini stuffed Kuri and prototype book! Our team loved creating those gifts, and we’re glad to hear your family is enjoying getting to know your robot. Thanks for sharing, and happy holidays! 🙂

item.title: By: Thu-Minh Huynh
item.dc:creator: Thu-Minh Huynh
item.description: Stuffed Kuri and her little background book have been the talk at our little family get-together during this Christmas season. Everyone can't wait to meet Kuri in the Spring. Thank you very much for such a thoughtful introduction! Kuri will be our elderly mom's daily companion. Happy New Year, best wishes, and much success to the Kuri Team!
item.content:encoded: Stuffed Kuri and her little background book have been the talk at our little family get-together during this Christmas season. Everyone can’t wait to meet Kuri in the Spring. Thank you very much for such a thoughtful introduction! Kuri will be our elderly mom’s daily companion. Happy New Year, best wishes, and much success to the Kuri Team!

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Vera - When you update the Kuri app on your smartphone, your robot will receive simultaneous software updates as they roll-out. Please let us know if you have any other questions.
item.content:encoded: Hi Vera – When you update the Kuri app on your smartphone, your robot will receive simultaneous software updates as they roll-out. Please let us know if you have any other questions.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Frank! We're so happy you're enjoying getting to know Kuri. Enjoy, and happy holidays! :D
item.content:encoded: Hi Frank! We’re so happy you’re enjoying getting to know Kuri. Enjoy, and happy holidays! 😀

item.title: By: Vera Carlson
item.dc:creator: Vera Carlson
item.description: I'm so anxious to get my Kuri. Can Kuri be "updated" like our cell phones when new features are introduced?
item.content:encoded: I’m so anxious to get my Kuri. Can Kuri be “updated” like our cell phones when new features are introduced?

item.title: By: Frank
item.dc:creator: Frank
item.description:
Well received Kuri today and it's just amazing! Shipment arrived by FedEx overnight. Packaging was amazing. Thought I was getting something from Apple. Not to sure on what I can write about but maybe the "Hey Kuri Support Team" could guide me. Kuri is charging now, then we will see what he/she can do. I thank the Kuri Support team on what they have done so far for me. Granddaughter will have a big surprise this Christmas.
P.S. Thank you for the stuffed Kuri and Book. Great collectors items.
item.content:encoded:
Well received Kuri today and it’s just amazing! Shipment arrived by FedEx overnight. Packaging was amazing. Thought I was getting something from Apple. Not to sure on what I can write about but maybe the “Hey Kuri Support Team” could guide me. Kuri is charging now, then we will see what he/she can do. I thank the Kuri Support team on what they have done so far for me. Granddaughter will have a big surprise this Christmas.

P.S. Thank you for the stuffed Kuri and Book. Great collectors items.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Patrick - Definitely! Kuri has a handle on his back for easy lifting up and down the stairs of your home. When you move Kuri to a new floor, simply open the Kuri app and toggle the maps she has saved in her system so she knows where she is. If you have any other questions, feel free to contact our customer care team directly at support@heykuri.com.
item.content:encoded: Hi Patrick – Definitely! Kuri has a handle on his back for easy lifting up and down the stairs of your home. When you move Kuri to a new floor, simply open the Kuri app and toggle the maps she has saved in her system so she knows where she is. If you have any other questions, feel free to contact our customer care team directly at support@heykuri.com.

item.title: By: Patrick
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description: This is wonderful news. The more emotions expressed the more this will be seen as less a robot and more a companion. A question: Can Kuri be programmed to navigate both the first and second floor of a home or only one floor? Thanks Patrick
item.content:encoded:
This is wonderful news. The more emotions expressed the more this will be seen as less a robot and more a companion. A question: Can Kuri be programmed to navigate both the first and second floor of a home or only one floor?
Thanks
Patrick

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Paul - Awesome! We can't wait for Lulu to meet our robot Kuri. Please share a pic/vid with us of when they meet! <3
item.content:encoded: Hi Paul – Awesome! We can’t wait for Lulu to meet our robot Kuri. Please share a pic/vid with us of when they meet! <3

item.title: By: paul dimino
item.dc:creator: paul dimino
item.description: got the book and the stuffed kuri today the book is very nice and i like seeing the bots leading to the final version,looking foward to getting my robot my dog lulu is happy with the stuffed one i also received
item.content:encoded: got the book and the stuffed kuri today the book is very nice and i like seeing the bots leading to the final version,looking foward to getting my robot my dog lulu is happy with the stuffed one i also received
